Rulings.Tengu:
● If a Set  “Alien” monster is destroyed by battle, you do not place A-Counters on this card. 
(It needs to be face-up at attack declaration).

PSCT.Tengu:
① If a face-up "Alien" monster(s) is destroyed, place 1 A-Counter on this card. 
② Once per turn: 
You can remove 2 A-Counters from the field; 
Special Summon 1 "Alien" monster from your GY.
